about_the_game:
"Will" and his alien buddies are paying an innocent school on Earth a visit for some routine abductions - or at least they were, before Will got ejected from the Mothership after a malfunction! Get Will back to his friends before they leave him behind!

Gameplay:

In this 2.5D physics-based patience-testing platformer, you'll use Will's tiny escape UFO to navigate the school and get back to the Mothership. One side of his tiny UFO creates a pushing Force, while the other side creates a pulling Force. You'll have to carefully maneuver Will's tiny UFO so these Forces can propel him through many treacherous obstacles, which are currently suspended in mid-air by the Mothership's malfunctioning tractor beam! Who knew abduction would be this tough?

Controls:

One side of Will's capsule repels.

While the other attracts.

To maneuver Will, all you have to do is move your mouse to change his orientation, and right-click to swap the direction of the Forces. Sounds simple enough, right...?

Can you make it to the top? Will the school prove too difficult for you to navigate?

There is only one way to find out if you have the Force of Will.

name: Force of Will

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: -
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Join Will and his alien mates as they abduct kids from Earth! But disaster strikes when Will’s UFO malfunctions, ejecting him mid-mission. Help him scale objects in the tractor beam back to his ship before it's too late!
